data.title: Search Jobs and Careers at Direct Line Group
data.meta_description: Direct Line Group is a place where tried and tested comes together with new and exciting. Learn about careers at DLG and view available jobs here.
data.text:
Meet DLG

Here at DLG we believe that thereâ€™s no one else like you. No one with the exact same mix of strengths, quirks, skills, and thoughts. We all work together to be brilliant for our customers every day. We're proud of who we are, of what we do, and what every single one of us brings to the team.

Like what you see? When we all come together, we can achieve great things. The question is, are you one of a kind too?
